EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5350 - Relieve Secondary Medical Reviewer Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET17_PSA_Relieve Secondary Medical Reviewer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Secondary Medical Reviewer Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Secondary Medical Reviewer listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Secondary Medical Reviewer is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Secondary_Medical_Reviewer__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You.
